summary: An ordinance approving and confirming the assessment and assessment roll of Local Improvement District No. 2516, for the improvement of East Newton Street from 11th Avenue North to 13th Avenue North, and certain parts of certain other streets and avenues all in the City of Seattle, by constructing concrete sidewalks, curbs, sewer and watermains, together with all appurtenances necessary for the proper sewerage, drainage, water service and fire protection of said district, under Ordinance No. 28808 and levying and assessing the amounts thereof against the several lots, tracts, parcels of land and other property as shown on said roll, establishing a Local Improvement Fund.
